price: ߊ߲ ߓߘߴߌ ߛߐ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ߕߊ߬ ߥߐߙߐ߲ߥߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ߫ ߓߟߋ߬ߓߟߋ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
